pre_caption: This is a wide scenery shot of St. Mark's Basilica in St. Mark's Square, Venice, on a sunny day. Numerous tourists and locals walk around the expansive plaza. Pigeons can also be seen on the ground among the people.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
